summary: This is a brief email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, with a copy to another unidentified party, regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It states that Epstein has filed a notice of appeal of the bail determination. The email is from the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; he has filed a notice of appeal of the bail determination.

events.title: Epstein files notice of appeal on bail
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein files a notice of appeal of the bail determination made in his case.

locations.name: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
locations.context: The office from which the email's sender, the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit, works.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein filed a notice of appeal regarding his bail determination on or before July 23, 2019.
The communication originates from the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email addresses of the sender, recipient, and CC'd party are redacted or omitted from the provided text.
